channel.title: SOMEONE PLEASE HELP! Local host connection problem
channel.description: Okay, I have the Client's IP set to 127.0.0.1...and it's still not letting me connect to server. I run the Source, Load the client, but when I try to login it says Error connecting to server. Someone please help, I want to connect locally so I am only player online so I can make server how I want it. PLEASE REPLY FAST!

item.title: SOMEONE PLEASE HELP! Local host connection problem
item.dc:creator: @vlad1 vlad1
item.description:
@vlad1 wrote:

This might sound stupid,but some peoples lack of common-sense makes me wonder.
Go to your compiler (client sided) and click it,if it does not run,edit it and change the Jdk to your suited JDK version.
JDk being java development kit.

TO find your JDK go to c:/ program files java and it should be there or if your on a 64 bit computer,program files (x86) java :).
I hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: SOMEONE PLEASE HELP! Local host connection problem
